title: Six Deals You Need To Know About In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 60% off Star Wars NERF Blasters, 50% off at Barbeques Galore, eBay's massive tech sale and more!

1. 60% off Star Wars toys: Amazon is selling select Star Wars action figures, NERF Blasters and lightsabers for 60% off. Click here!

2. Cheap LG 4K Smart TV: LG has knocked the feature-packed 55-inch OLED55C9PTA TV down to $2170. To get the full discount, use the code 'POLLEN20' at checkout. Click here!

3. Grog gear sale: Catch is having a 'Drink Up!' sale which curiously doesn't contain any alcohol. Instead, you can save big on grog-friendly glassware, ice picks, mixers, wine racks and more. Prices start at under $4! Click here.

4. 20% off 80 tech products: eBay is having another tech sale with 20% off when you use the discount code 'POLLEN20'. Available products include Dell PC desktops, Bose headphones, Sony digital cameras and Apple iPad Pros. Click here to see the deals!

5. Barbeques Galore Mid-Season Sale: Barbeques Galore is having a spring clearance sale with up to 50% off barbeques, outdoor furniture and assorted cooking gear. Click here!

6. Cheap 90Mbps NBN: NBN 100 plans tend to max out at around 80MBps during peak usage times. Superloop just upped the ante with a guaranteed evening speed of 90Mbps. You can also get one month free when you use the discount code 'SLNBN'. Here are the details:

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 60% off Star Wars NERF Blasters, 50% off at Barbeques Galore, eBay's massive tech sale and more!...
